org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.job
Interface JobSpec

All Superinterfaces:
TaskSpec
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseJobSpec
public interface JobSpec
extends TaskSpec

Specifies a "job" to run an executable on computing resource(s) that match the given requirements.

Returns the location of the executable.

setExecutableLocation

public void setExecutableLocation(FileLocation executable)
Sets the location of the executable. The executable need not be on the resource if the job submission service supports file staging, which most do.

Parameters:
executable - The executable location
